oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Marriage certificate of William H. Bendy, Co. M, 9th N.J. Inf. Regt., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Marriage certificate of Civil War veteran William H. Bendy, Co. M, 9th N.J. Inf. Regt., USA. Bendy married just after the war and the document carries a revenue stamp. These stamps were only in use from 1863 to 1866. The document was issued by the Presbyterian Church.
